name: Garmin Heart Rate Monitor - Run - Unisex
description: More than a run-of-the-mill heartrate monitor. For those looking to perfect their running form, Garmin's run specific HRM does just that: foot cadence, vertical bounce per glide, ground contact time and stride length are all measured in a light and compact package.Integrated accelerometer measures vertical oscillation, ground contact time, vertical ratio and stride length.Heartrate data is hyper-accurate and ANT+ compatible.Running motion features only compatible with select Garmin products.Replaceable coin battery provides up to 10 months of battery.
